name: Delinquent Wife Hinako ~Making Her Mind And Body Mine!~
name_original: Delinquent Wife Hinako ~Making Her Mind And Body Mine!~
description:
Having just entered college, the protagonist moves to an apartment where his neighbor
is none other than his hometown’s delinquent Hinako, who he knew as a child.

Seeing how little she has changed over the years, his childhood feelings for her
resurface for the first time in a decade.

But Hinako is a now a married woman with a child.

Will he be able to contain his old feelings for her?
Or will the now sexy adult Hinako be too much for him to bare?​
